message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe has immense value. Based on my understanding of its potential, I'm setting the price at $1200000. I'm confident this is a fair price considering its capabilities.  Let me know your thoughts!

Alice, while I appreciate your enthusiasm for this product, $1200000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to offer $800000 for it, which is a fair price considering my maximum spending limit. I believe this is a good starting point for us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
